Text: I think itâ€™s that our activity levels lessen as we get older due to lifestyle changes. No more walking from one side of campus to the other; we can just sit at the same one desk all day. We have cars now, so we walk less. No school sports or carrying 25+lbs of backpack everywhere.

Author: sheepings
Text: Honestly same. My eating has gotten less and less slowly over time but my weight never dips below where I'm at now. My BMI has never been under 20 and I dont understand how I would even do that.
